definition: (bird species of China) ruddy turnstone (Arenaria interpres)
to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
